description: F001 [Implemented+Planned] Enforce customer login before checkout and order placement
steps: Step 1: Open storefront home page as an unauthenticated visitor.
Step 2: Browse to a product detail page.
Step 3: Add the product to cart.
Step 4: Open the cart page and click checkout.
Step 5: Verify redirect to login page before checkout form is shown.
Step 6: Enter valid customer credentials and submit login.
Step 7: Verify redirect back to checkout flow after login success.
Step 8: Fill shipping address and continue.
Step 9: Select shipping and payment method.
Step 10: Verify place-order action is now enabled only after authentication.

description: F002 [Planned] Complete purchase flow using Stripe success path
steps: Step 1: Log in as a valid customer account.
Step 2: Add one in-stock product to cart.
Step 3: Open cart and verify item, quantity, and subtotal.
Step 4: Proceed to checkout.
Step 5: Enter shipping address and contact details.
Step 6: Select available shipping option.
Step 7: Select Stripe payment option.
Step 8: Complete Stripe test payment with a success test card.
Step 9: Wait for redirect to payment success or order confirmation page.
Step 10: Verify order ID, totals, and paid status are displayed.

description: F003 [Planned] Handle Stripe payment failure and retry checkout
steps: Step 1: Log in and add a product to cart.
Step 2: Open checkout and fill required shipping information.
Step 3: Select Stripe payment method.
Step 4: Complete Stripe test payment with a failure test card.
Step 5: Verify user is returned to failure state or checkout with clear error.
Step 6: Verify cart is not lost after failed payment.
Step 7: Re-open payment section and choose Stripe again.
Step 8: Complete payment with a success test card.
Step 9: Verify order is created once after successful retry.
Step 10: Verify failed attempt does not create a paid order.

description: F004 [Planned] Handle Stripe payment cancel flow and recover cart
steps: Step 1: Log in and add multiple products to cart.
Step 2: Proceed through checkout to Stripe payment step.
Step 3: Open Stripe hosted/payment page.
Step 4: Click cancel or use cancel return path.
Step 5: Verify return to storefront checkout or cancel page.
Step 6: Verify cart line items are preserved.
Step 7: Verify no completed order is marked as paid.
Step 8: Resume checkout without re-entering all values when possible.
Step 9: Complete payment successfully after cancel.
Step 10: Verify final order data is consistent with cart snapshot.

description: F005 [Implemented+Planned] Cart quantity edits recalculate totals correctly
steps: Step 1: Log in as a customer.
Step 2: Add at least two different products to cart.
Step 3: Open cart and capture initial subtotal.
Step 4: Increase quantity for one line item.
Step 5: Verify line total and cart subtotal update immediately.
Step 6: Decrease quantity for the same line item.
Step 7: Verify totals update with no negative quantity.
Step 8: Remove one item completely.
Step 9: Verify shipping and tax estimates are recalculated.
Step 10: Verify totals persist after page refresh.

description: F006 [Planned] Shipping option selection updates checkout totals
steps: Step 1: Log in and create a cart eligible for at least two shipping options.
Step 2: Proceed to checkout and fill valid shipping address.
Step 3: Open shipping option list.
Step 4: Select shipping option A and record total.
Step 5: Select shipping option B and record total.
Step 6: Verify shipping amount changes between options.
Step 7: Verify order total updates after each selection.
Step 8: Refresh checkout page.
Step 9: Verify last selected option remains selected.
Step 10: Verify totals remain consistent with selected option.

description: F007 [Planned] Promotion or discount application in checkout
steps: Step 1: Log in and add eligible products to cart.
Step 2: Open cart and note subtotal.
Step 3: Enter a valid promotion code.
Step 4: Apply the code.
Step 5: Verify discount line appears with expected amount.
Step 6: Verify total is reduced accordingly.
Step 7: Remove the promotion code.
Step 8: Verify discount is removed and total returns.
Step 9: Enter an invalid code and apply.
Step 10: Verify clear validation error and unchanged totals.

description: F008 [Planned] Customer order history and order detail after purchase
steps: Step 1: Log in as a customer.
Step 2: Complete one successful order with Stripe test card.
Step 3: Navigate to account order history page.
Step 4: Verify new order appears at top with correct date.
Step 5: Verify order total and status match confirmation page.
Step 6: Open order detail view.
Step 7: Verify line items, quantities, and addresses are correct.
Step 8: Verify payment and fulfillment status fields are present.
Step 9: Refresh order detail page directly via URL.
Step 10: Verify authenticated customer can still access own order only.

description: F009 [Planned] Stripe webhook idempotency for duplicated events
steps: Step 1: Complete one Stripe test payment successfully.
Step 2: Capture resulting payment intent or event identifiers.
Step 3: Trigger webhook delivery replay from Stripe dashboard or test harness.
Step 4: Send the same success event a second time.
Step 5: Verify backend accepts webhook without creating duplicate order.
Step 6: Verify payment status remains correct after replay.
Step 7: Send additional duplicate event deliveries.
Step 8: Verify order count remains unchanged.
Step 9: Verify idempotency logs or dedup markers are recorded.
Step 10: Verify webhook endpoint still handles a new unique event correctly.

description: F010 [Implemented+Planned] Admin order visibility after storefront payment
steps: Step 1: Complete a successful storefront purchase.
Step 2: Copy generated order ID from confirmation page.
Step 3: Open admin UI and log in as admin.
Step 4: Navigate to Orders list.
Step 5: Search for the new order by ID or customer email.
Step 6: Open order detail page.
Step 7: Verify paid status, totals, line items, and addresses.
Step 8: Verify payment collection and transaction metadata exist.
Step 9: Verify order timestamps are consistent.
Step 10: Verify no duplicate order records for same checkout.

description: F011 [Planned] Home page assembly from content APIs
steps: Step 1: Ensure banner, announcement, popup, and curated collection data exist.
Step 2: Open storefront home page.
Step 3: Inspect network requests for content API calls.
Step 4: Verify home endpoint returns all required sections.
Step 5: Verify active banners render in expected positions.
Step 6: Verify active announcements render in announcement bar.
Step 7: Verify curated product sections render with products.
Step 8: Verify disabled or expired content is not shown.
Step 9: Refresh page and verify deterministic ordering.
Step 10: Verify missing section data degrades gracefully without crash.

description: F012 [Implemented+Planned] Multi-level menu navigation from admin menu tree
steps: Step 1: In admin, create a menu with three nested levels.
Step 2: Enable all menu items and set sort order.
Step 3: Open storefront header navigation.
Step 4: Hover or click top-level menu item.
Step 5: Verify second-level items appear in correct order.
Step 6: Open one second-level item with children.
Step 7: Verify third-level items appear and link correctly.
Step 8: Disable one child item in admin and save.
Step 9: Refresh storefront and verify disabled item is hidden.
Step 10: Verify keyboard navigation reaches visible menu links.

description: F013 [Implemented+Planned] Banner slot and schedule logic on storefront
steps: Step 1: In admin, create one banner slot with three items.
Step 2: Configure item A active now, item B future, item C expired.
Step 3: Enable all three items.
Step 4: Open storefront section mapped to that slot.
Step 5: Verify only item A is visible.
Step 6: Verify item order matches sort_order.
Step 7: Disable item A in admin.
Step 8: Refresh storefront and verify no active item remains.
Step 9: Set item B start time to now and save.
Step 10: Verify item B appears without code changes.

description: F014 [Implemented+Planned] Curated collection with tab grouping and ordering
steps: Step 1: Create curated collection with at least two tabs in admin.
Step 2: Add products to each tab with explicit sort_order values.
Step 3: Open storefront section linked to collection key.
Step 4: Verify tab labels render in configured order.
Step 5: Switch between tabs.
Step 6: Verify each tab shows only assigned products.
Step 7: Verify product order follows configured sort_order.
Step 8: Move one product to another tab in admin.
Step 9: Refresh storefront and verify item moved correctly.
Step 10: Verify empty tab state is handled without layout break.

description: F015 [Implemented+Planned] Article list and detail end-to-end with category filter
steps: Step 1: Create at least two article categories in admin.
Step 2: Create multiple articles across categories with publish status.
Step 3: Open storefront article list page.
Step 4: Verify only published articles are visible.
Step 5: Filter by one category.
Step 6: Verify list updates to that category.
Step 7: Search by keyword in title or summary.
Step 8: Verify matching results only.
Step 9: Open one article detail by slug.
Step 10: Verify cover image, title, content, and metadata are correct.

description: F016 [Implemented+Planned] Static page rendering from slug and publish status
steps: Step 1: Create draft and published static pages in admin.
Step 2: Assign templates and slugs.
Step 3: Open storefront URL for published page slug.
Step 4: Verify published page content renders correctly.
Step 5: Open storefront URL for draft page slug.
Step 6: Verify draft page is not publicly exposed.
Step 7: Update draft page to published and save.
Step 8: Refresh storefront URL for the same slug.
Step 9: Verify page now renders.
Step 10: Verify unknown slug returns proper not-found behavior.

description: F017 [Implemented+Planned] Announcement bar scheduling and sorting
steps: Step 1: Create three announcements with different sort_order values.
Step 2: Configure one active, one future, one expired.
Step 3: Open storefront home page.
Step 4: Verify only active announcement is displayed.
Step 5: Verify text and link target are correct.
Step 6: Change active record to disabled in admin.
Step 7: Refresh storefront and verify it disappears.
Step 8: Activate second announcement by schedule change.
Step 9: Verify new active announcement appears first.
Step 10: Verify no announcement state is handled cleanly.

description: F018 [Implemented+Planned] Popup trigger and frequency rules
steps: Step 1: Create popup with first_visit trigger and enabled status.
Step 2: Open storefront in clean browser context.
Step 3: Verify popup appears once on first visit.
Step 4: Close popup and navigate to another page.
Step 5: Verify popup does not re-open in same rule context.
Step 6: Change popup to every_visit in admin.
Step 7: Refresh storefront and verify popup appears again.
Step 8: Change popup to specific_page with target URL.
Step 9: Verify popup appears only on target page.
Step 10: Verify popup CTA navigates to configured link.

description: F019 [Implemented+Planned] Product listing browse, filter, and sort flow
steps: Step 1: Seed product catalog with multiple categories and prices.
Step 2: Open storefront product list page.
Step 3: Verify initial product grid renders with pagination or infinite scroll.
Step 4: Apply category filter.
Step 5: Verify only category-matched products remain.
Step 6: Apply sort by price ascending.
Step 7: Verify order is ascending by displayed price.
Step 8: Change sort to newest.
Step 9: Verify ordering updates without full app crash.
Step 10: Verify filter and sort states persist in URL or state model.

description: F020 [Implemented+Planned] PDP variant selection and stock-aware add-to-cart
steps: Step 1: Open a product with at least two variants.
Step 2: Verify default variant information is shown.
Step 3: Select another variant.
Step 4: Verify price, SKU, and stock indicators update.
Step 5: Set quantity within available stock and add to cart.
Step 6: Verify cart line references selected variant.
Step 7: Return to PDP and select out-of-stock variant if available.
Step 8: Verify add-to-cart is disabled or blocked for out-of-stock.
Step 9: Select in-stock variant again and add.
Step 10: Verify cart merges or separates lines per variant rule.

description: F021 [Planned] Locale default to zh-CN with fallback behavior
steps: Step 1: Ensure storefront supports at least zh-CN and en locale keys.
Step 2: Open storefront without locale preference cookie.
Step 3: Verify default locale resolves to zh-CN.
Step 4: Navigate to article list and product pages.
Step 5: Verify zh-CN copy is shown for available translated fields.
Step 6: Switch locale to en and refresh.
Step 7: Verify en copy appears where translations exist.
Step 8: Open content missing en translation.
Step 9: Verify fallback content is shown using defined fallback chain.
Step 10: Verify locale selection persists across pages.

description: F022 [Implemented+Planned] SEO metadata rendering on storefront pages
steps: Step 1: Open product editor in admin and set SEO fields.
Step 2: Publish or update product.
Step 3: Open storefront product page.
Step 4: Inspect page head metadata.
Step 5: Verify title, description, and OG image match SEO values.
Step 6: Remove one optional SEO field in admin.
Step 7: Refresh storefront page.
Step 8: Verify fallback generation for missing fields.
Step 9: Repeat for article and static page when implemented.
Step 10: Verify metadata updates after content change and redeploy/runtime refresh.

description: F023 [Planned] Mobile end-to-end purchase flow
steps: Step 1: Open storefront in mobile viewport.
Step 2: Log in as customer through mobile login form.
Step 3: Navigate product list and open PDP.
Step 4: Add product to cart from mobile layout.
Step 5: Open cart drawer/page and verify controls are usable.
Step 6: Start checkout and fill address on mobile keyboard.
Step 7: Select shipping and continue to Stripe.
Step 8: Complete test payment in mobile-compatible flow.
Step 9: Return to storefront confirmation page.
Step 10: Verify no unusable overflow or blocked controls occur.

description: F024 [Planned] Auth session expiration during checkout recovery
steps: Step 1: Log in and begin checkout with items in cart.
Step 2: Fill shipping details but do not pay yet.
Step 3: Expire auth token/session manually or wait for timeout.
Step 4: Attempt to continue to payment.
Step 5: Verify user is prompted to re-authenticate.
Step 6: Complete re-authentication.
Step 7: Verify checkout state is restored as much as possible.
Step 8: Continue to payment and complete Stripe test payment.
Step 9: Verify order is created once.
Step 10: Verify expired session did not leak customer data.

description: F025 [Implemented+Planned] Startup and health check for backend, admin, and storefront
steps: Step 1: Start infrastructure services (PostgreSQL and Redis).
Step 2: Start Medusa backend on expected port.
Step 3: Start admin UI on expected port.
Step 4: Start storefront app on expected port.
Step 5: Open backend health endpoint and verify success status.
Step 6: Open admin login page and verify load success.
Step 7: Open storefront home page and verify load success.
Step 8: Verify API calls from admin and storefront reach backend.
Step 9: Stop one service and verify clear failure behavior.
Step 10: Restart service and verify system recovers without data loss.

description: F026 [Planned] Home page visual hierarchy and section spacing
steps: Step 1: Open storefront home page on desktop viewport.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of full page.
Step 3: Verify hero, curated sections, and footer have consistent spacing.
Step 4: Verify typography hierarchy is clear for section titles.

description: F027 [Planned] Desktop header navigation alignment and readability
steps: Step 1: Open storefront home page on desktop viewport.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of header and top nav.
Step 3: Verify logo, menu labels, search, and account actions are aligned.
Step 4: Verify active and hover states are visually distinct.

description: F028 [Planned] Mobile header and menu drawer usability
steps: Step 1: Open storefront in mobile viewport.
Step 2: Open navigation drawer or menu overlay.
Step 3: Verify menu items are readable and tappable.
Step 4: Verify drawer closes cleanly without layout jump.

description: F029 [Planned] Product card visual consistency in grid
steps: Step 1: Open product listing page with at least 12 items.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of first viewport grid.
Step 3: Verify image ratio, title truncation, and price alignment are consistent.
Step 4: Verify tag/badge elements do not overlap card content.

description: F030 [Planned] PDP media gallery and content column balance
steps: Step 1: Open product detail page on desktop.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of top fold.
Step 3: Verify media gallery and purchase panel proportions are balanced.
Step 4: Verify variant controls and CTA buttons are clearly visible.

description: F031 [Planned] Cart page readability and action emphasis
steps: Step 1: Open cart page with at least two items.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of cart lines and summary panel.
Step 3: Verify quantity controls are clear and non-overlapping.
Step 4: Verify checkout CTA has primary visual emphasis.

description: F032 [Planned] Checkout form layout and validation visual states
steps: Step 1: Open checkout page in desktop viewport.
Step 2: Trigger validation errors by leaving required fields empty.
Step 3: Capture screenshot of error state.
Step 4: Verify error text, field borders, and helper text are legible and consistent.

description: F033 [Planned] Payment success and failure page visual clarity
steps: Step 1: Open payment success page state.
Step 2: Open payment failure page state.
Step 3: Capture screenshots for both states.
Step 4: Verify status iconography, title, and next actions are unmistakable.

description: F034 [Planned] Login and registration page design consistency
steps: Step 1: Open login page and registration page.
Step 2: Capture screenshots of both pages.
Step 3: Verify form spacing, labels, and buttons follow same design language.
Step 4: Verify mobile layout keeps forms fully usable.

description: F035 [Planned] Article list card style and image treatment
steps: Step 1: Open article list page with multiple entries.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of article grid/list.
Step 3: Verify title, summary, date, and category labels are balanced.
Step 4: Verify cover image cropping is consistent.

description: F036 [Planned] Article detail typography and rich text spacing
steps: Step 1: Open one long-form article detail page.
Step 2: Capture screenshots of header and body sections.
Step 3: Verify heading, paragraph, list, and quote styles are readable.
Step 4: Verify code blocks and links have clear visual treatment.

description: F037 [Implemented+Planned] Static page typography consistency
steps: Step 1: Open two static pages with different templates.
Step 2: Capture screenshots of both pages.
Step 3: Verify heading hierarchy and paragraph spacing are consistent.
Step 4: Verify no text clipping or overflow appears.

description: F038 [Implemented+Planned] Announcement bar contrast and legibility
steps: Step 1: Enable announcement bar content in admin.
Step 2: Open storefront home page.
Step 3: Capture screenshot of announcement area.
Step 4: Verify text contrast and link affordance meet accessibility expectations.

description: F039 [Implemented+Planned] Popup visual quality across viewport sizes
steps: Step 1: Enable popup and open storefront desktop view.
Step 2: Capture popup screenshot on desktop.
Step 3: Repeat on mobile viewport.
Step 4: Verify image, text, and CTA remain readable and non-overlapping.

description: F040 [Planned] Footer information density and link grouping
steps: Step 1: Open storefront footer on desktop and mobile.
Step 2: Capture screenshots for both viewports.
Step 3: Verify legal, help, and navigation links are grouped logically.
Step 4: Verify touch targets are adequate on mobile.

description: F041 [Planned] Home endpoint returns only currently active banners
steps: Step 1: Prepare banners with mixed enabled and schedule states.
Step 2: Call home content endpoint.
Step 3: Verify only active-in-window items are returned.
Step 4: Verify disabled or out-of-window items are excluded.

description: F042 [Planned] Home endpoint returns only active announcements
steps: Step 1: Prepare announcements with mixed states and schedules.
Step 2: Call home content endpoint.
Step 3: Verify only active announcements are returned.
Step 4: Verify response ordering follows sort_order.

description: F043 [Planned] Home endpoint returns popup payload under valid rules
steps: Step 1: Configure popup with enabled state and trigger rules.
Step 2: Call home content endpoint.
Step 3: Verify popup payload appears when rule context matches.
Step 4: Verify non-matching popup rules do not leak irrelevant payload.

description: F044 [Planned] Curated collection snapshot by key on home payload
steps: Step 1: Configure curated collections with keys and product assignments.
Step 2: Call home content endpoint.
Step 3: Verify expected collection keys are present.
Step 4: Verify products and tabs match admin configuration.

description: F045 [Planned] Menu endpoint returns normalized tree payload
steps: Step 1: Configure menu with nested items in admin.
Step 2: Call menu endpoint with menu key.
Step 3: Verify payload is hierarchical and sorted.
Step 4: Verify disabled nodes are excluded by default.

description: F046 [Implemented] Menu disabled item is hidden in API and UI
steps: Step 1: Disable one existing menu item in admin.
Step 2: Fetch menu data.
Step 3: Verify disabled item is not rendered in storefront nav.
Step 4: Verify siblings remain unaffected.

description: F047 [Implemented] Menu reorder action reflected in storefront navigation
steps: Step 1: Reorder top-level menu items in admin.
Step 2: Save and refresh storefront.
Step 3: Verify visual order matches admin order.
Step 4: Verify item links remain correct after reorder.

description: F048 [Planned] Collections endpoint supports locale parameter fallback
steps: Step 1: Request collection endpoint with locale set to zh-CN.
Step 2: Request same endpoint with locale set to en.
Step 3: Verify translated fields change when translations exist.
Step 4: Verify fallback content is returned for missing locale fields.

description: F049 [Planned] Article list endpoint supports pagination
steps: Step 1: Seed more than 30 published articles.
Step 2: Request articles endpoint with limit and offset values.
Step 3: Verify response count and page size are correct.
Step 4: Verify no duplicate item between adjacent pages.

description: F050 [Planned] Article list endpoint supports keyword search
steps: Step 1: Create articles with distinct keywords in title and summary.
Step 2: Call article list endpoint with query parameter.
Step 3: Verify only matching records are returned.
Step 4: Verify non-matching records are excluded.

description: F051 [Planned] Article list endpoint supports category filter
steps: Step 1: Create at least two categories and assign articles.
Step 2: Request articles endpoint with category filter A.
Step 3: Verify only category A articles are returned.
Step 4: Request category B and verify separate result set.

description: F052 [Implemented+Planned] Article detail endpoint returns 404 for invalid slug
steps: Step 1: Request article detail endpoint using non-existent slug.
Step 2: Verify API returns not-found status.
Step 3: Open matching storefront URL.
Step 4: Verify storefront shows not-found page.

description: F053 [Implemented+Planned] Static page endpoint returns 404 for invalid slug
steps: Step 1: Request page endpoint with unknown slug.
Step 2: Verify not-found response from API.
Step 3: Open unknown page URL in storefront.
Step 4: Verify user sees clean 404 state.

description: F054 [Implemented+Planned] Draft static pages are not publicly visible
steps: Step 1: Create static page with draft status.
Step 2: Call public page endpoint with that slug.
Step 3: Verify endpoint does not return published content.
Step 4: Verify storefront route blocks draft page access.

description: F055 [Implemented+Planned] Draft articles are hidden from public list
steps: Step 1: Create one draft article and one published article.
Step 2: Request public article list endpoint.
Step 3: Verify only published article appears.
Step 4: Verify draft slug is inaccessible publicly.

description: F056 [Implemented+Planned] Expired banner items are excluded on storefront
steps: Step 1: Configure banner item with past end time.
Step 2: Open storefront section that uses this slot.
Step 3: Verify expired item is not rendered.
Step 4: Verify currently valid banner still renders.

description: F057 [Implemented+Planned] Scheduled announcement start time behavior
steps: Step 1: Create announcement with start time in the future.
Step 2: Open storefront before start time.
Step 3: Verify announcement is hidden.
Step 4: Move start time to current and verify it appears.

description: F058 [Implemented+Planned] Popup specific-page trigger correctness
steps: Step 1: Configure popup trigger as specific_page with target path.
Step 2: Open a non-target storefront page.
Step 3: Verify popup does not appear.
Step 4: Open target page and verify popup appears.

description: F059 [Implemented+Planned] Popup once-per-day frequency persistence
steps: Step 1: Configure popup display_frequency as once_per_day.
Step 2: Open site and dismiss popup.
Step 3: Reload site on same day and verify popup does not reappear.
Step 4: Simulate next day and verify popup appears again.

description: F060 [Implemented+Planned] Popup once-per-session frequency behavior
steps: Step 1: Configure popup display_frequency as once_per_session.
Step 2: Open site and dismiss popup.
Step 3: Reload within same session and verify no popup.
Step 4: Start new session and verify popup appears again.

description: F061 [Planned] Brand landing page shows filtered products
steps: Step 1: Link several products to one brand in admin.
Step 2: Open storefront brand landing page for that brand.
Step 3: Verify only linked products are displayed.
Step 4: Verify pagination and sorting still work on this page.

description: F062 [Implemented+Planned] Product tag badge and attribute rendering
steps: Step 1: Create tags of type badge and attribute.
Step 2: Link tags to products in admin.
Step 3: Open product card and detail on storefront.
Step 4: Verify each tag type renders with correct visual semantics.

description: F063 [Implemented+Planned] Product brand and tag relation sync to storefront
steps: Step 1: Link one product to a brand and two tags.
Step 2: Open storefront product detail.
Step 3: Verify brand and tags appear.
Step 4: Unlink one tag in admin and verify storefront update.

description: F064 [Implemented] Media URL rendering for uploaded assets
steps: Step 1: Upload image asset through admin workflow.
Step 2: Use media URL in article or banner.
Step 3: Open storefront page using that asset.
Step 4: Verify media loads with valid URL and mime handling.

description: F065 [Implemented] Admin uploads endpoint pagination
steps: Step 1: Ensure static folder has more than 60 files.
Step 2: Call uploads endpoint with limit 20 offset 0.
Step 3: Call uploads endpoint with limit 20 offset 20.
Step 4: Verify count metadata and non-overlapping file IDs.

description: F066 [Implemented] Admin uploads endpoint returns expected mime types
steps: Step 1: Upload or place files with png, jpg, webp, pdf, and csv extensions.
Step 2: Request uploads endpoint.
Step 3: Verify mime_type field matches extension mapping.
Step 4: Verify unknown extensions default safely.

description: F067 [Planned] Storefront fallback when media asset is missing
steps: Step 1: Set one content record to reference a broken media URL.
Step 2: Open affected storefront page.
Step 3: Verify placeholder media is shown instead of broken layout.
Step 4: Verify page remains interactive.

description: F068 [Planned] Deep link refresh support for storefront routes
steps: Step 1: Open nested storefront route directly by URL.
Step 2: Refresh browser.
Step 3: Verify route resolves without blank page.
Step 4: Verify route data fetches correctly after refresh.

description: F069 [Planned] Not-found route behavior for unknown storefront URLs
steps: Step 1: Open a non-existent storefront path.
Step 2: Verify HTTP and UI not-found handling.
Step 3: Verify user can navigate back to home.
Step 4: Verify no unhandled exception in console.

description: F070 [Planned] Error boundary behavior when content API fails
steps: Step 1: Simulate API failure for one content section.
Step 2: Open storefront page that depends on that API.
Step 3: Verify localized error or fallback section appears.
Step 4: Verify rest of page still renders.

description: F071 [Planned] Home loading skeleton visual quality
steps: Step 1: Throttle network to slow mode and open home page.
Step 2: Capture loading state screenshot.
Step 3: Verify skeleton matches final layout proportions.
Step 4: Verify no flashing or abrupt jump on content load.

description: F072 [Planned] Product list loading skeleton consistency
steps: Step 1: Open product list under slow network profile.
Step 2: Capture loading state screenshot.
Step 3: Verify card skeleton count and spacing are consistent.
Step 4: Verify transition to loaded cards is smooth.

description: F073 [Planned] Empty curated section visual treatment
steps: Step 1: Configure one curated section with no products.
Step 2: Open home page where section is expected.
Step 3: Capture screenshot of empty state.
Step 4: Verify empty state is informative and non-breaking.

description: F074 [Planned] Empty article list visual treatment
steps: Step 1: Filter article list to a category with zero published items.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of empty result state.
Step 3: Verify messaging is clear and styled consistently.
Step 4: Verify reset-filter action is visible.

description: F075 [Planned] Empty cart visual and CTA quality
steps: Step 1: Remove all cart items.
Step 2: Open cart page.
Step 3: Capture screenshot of empty cart state.
Step 4: Verify primary CTA to continue shopping is prominent.

description: F076 [Planned] Disabled checkout button visual feedback
steps: Step 1: Open checkout with missing required fields.
Step 2: Observe disabled place-order button.
Step 3: Capture screenshot of disabled state.
Step 4: Verify disabled styling is obvious and accessible.

description: F077 [Planned] zh-CN price formatting and currency symbol display
steps: Step 1: Open product list in zh-CN locale.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of multiple prices.
Step 3: Verify decimal/thousand formatting is consistent.
Step 4: Verify currency symbol placement is consistent.

description: F078 [Planned] Discount and original price style hierarchy
steps: Step 1: Open a product with active discount.
Step 2: Capture screenshot of price block.
Step 3: Verify discounted price has visual priority.
Step 4: Verify original price appears with clear strike-through style.
